description:
I'm a web developer 👨🏼‍💻, music-lover 🎷, surfer 🏄‍♂️, and tall person.

Currently, I spend my days as a front-end developer at Bean, building cool stuff with modern Javascript frameworks like Vue and React. Before coding full-time I worked in the music industry for over a decade as an audio engineer, mixer & producer. I live with my wife, daughter, and pup in Los Angeles.
fine_print: This blog was created using Forestry & Gridsome
